review: I visited pristine dental clinic for my wisdom teeth pain, Dr Athhar took the x-ray and explained me the reason why the pain was there, he explained me the complete procedure in detail and even the treatment was very smooth and really to say it took hardly 20 mins and it was done, they even give post treatment instructions soft copy that was something new for me. overall I was really relieved from pain and satisfied with treatment and clinic.I highly recommend Dr Athhar at Pristine Dental Clinic, **** ****** ****** ** *** *******
reply_text: Thank you for sharing your experience at Pristine Dental Advanced Multi-speciality Clinic, HSR layout, Bangalore

review:
I had visited this clinic a month ago, I was under severe pain for 3 days then I gathered courage to visit the dentist, Dr Athhar Maswood I should have gone to visit him earlier itself,  he listened to all my problems and explained me the exact reason for issues and the treatment started right away. I had my RCT done and later the Zirconia crown over it, there is no pain or any kind of issues post treatment. I would really recommend Pristine Dental Advanced Multispeciality Clinic, HSR Layout. 
Thank you Dr. Athhar Maswood K
